title: anyone know whats going on with the servers?
body: the servers arent working and ive wasted skin boosts anyone know whats happening?

replies.body: There were some stability issues with the server last night, and ranked queues were disabled.  I recommend bookmarking our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, where updates on issues will be updated.  Everything looks okay now!

Probably a network cable got fiddled with server side. I was experiencing high packet loss for upwards of fifteen minutes in my game before I relogged, which happened to be successful. Of course, that didn't fix it, but it was worth a try.
ok thanks for the explanation i just wasted 2 skin boosts though ;^;

> [{quoted}](name=scarletvoidling,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5G7GlAAE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-03T04:22:15.099+0000)
>
> ok thanks for the explanation i just wasted 2 skin boosts though ;^;

Support will probably refund you if you message them.
how do i message them btw sorry i dont use the forums much

> [{quoted}](name=scarletvoidling,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5G7GlAAE,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-03T04:25:10.244+0000)
>
> how do i message them btw sorry i dont use the forums much

There's an info bar at the top of the page, and on the far right is "Support". Wander over there and you'll come across a link to send in a support ticket. Just explain what happened, and you may or may not get an automated/copy+pasted response from them.
